title: Government Data Sources for International Reporting
description: A list of US government data sources for international reporting, including federal contracts in Denmark, import refusal data from the FDA, weapons authorizations by country from the Department of State, EDGAR search by country from the Securities and Exchange Commission, foreign gifts and trips by U.S. lawmakers from Legistorm, international energy statistics from the Energy administration, aircraft registry from the Federal Aviation Administration, IRS tax exempt organizations - international file, foreign lobbyists from Department of Homeland Security, removals and returns from the Internal Revenue Service, and global trade data from Panjiva.
